files.patch: @@ -2057,1 +2057,1 @@ - nth-child() + nth-child(even | odd) @@ -2059,2 +2059,1 @@ - (the only acceptable arguments are "even" and "odd": the first child at index 0 - matches "odd", the second child at index 1 matches "even", etc.) + (the first child at index 0 matches "odd", the second child at index 1 matches "even", etc.)
